EmailTemplate.name: Accidental Damage
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thanks for reaching out to YETI! I'm sorry to hear about the recent damage to your YETI product. I will be unable to process your warranty request as accidental damage is not covered under our warranty policy.
For more information regarding our warranty policy, please visit our warranty page on our website.
Please let me know if you have any other questions.
Sincerely,
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
